column4: Fast Attacks increase Strong Attack damage for $S$ seconds by $S$% for each piece of the set. Current bonus: $S$%.
The overall spell power of all Signs is increased by 5%.

If a sign is cast when you have full aderenaline, Geralt will enter a heightened state where he is invincible and all sword and sign damage is doubled for 15 seconds. Cannot be used again afterwords for 60 seconds.
